law.text:
If the attempt to incorporate a savings and loan association is unsuccessful:
The chairman of the incorporators shall refund amounts paid to the initial accounts under this subtitle, except that the expense fund and paid-in surplus accounts are first subject to all reasonable expenses; and
The Division Director shall release the surety bond of the chairman of the incorporators when the Director has satisfactory assurance that:
All expenses have been paid; and
All amounts under item (1) of this section have been refunded.
